translations: 按大小分类；上浆；相比（size 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 与实际尺寸相同的；足尺的

sentences.sentence: The screws are sized in millimetres.
sentences.translation: 这些螺丝是用毫米标定大小的。

sentences.sentence: A medium-sized dog will devour at least one can of food plus biscuits per day.
sentences.translation: 一只中等大小的狗每天至少要干掉一罐食物外加饼干。

sentences.sentence: He sized up the situation very quickly.
sentences.translation: 他很快对形势作出了判断。
